properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , POST_CODE , ADDRESS , DETAILED_ADDRESS , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS , POINT FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , POST_CODE , ADDRESS , DETAILED_ADDRESS ) VALUES ( MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
